# ok(_:)

**Instance Method**

The action method that the panel calls when the user clicks the OK button.

## Declaration

```swift
@IBAction @MainActor func ok(_ sender: Any?)
```

## Parameters

- **sender**: The [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSavePanel] object that contains the OK button.

## Discussion

In macOS 10.15 and later, you cannot call this method programmatically to trigger the OK action. Prior to macOS 10.15, AppKit prevented only sandboxed apps from calling this method.

## Handling Actions

- **cancel(_:)**: The action method that the panel calls when the user clicks the Cancel button.
